## Tasks

## task 1:
Get the working directory for this lab:
````{r}
getwd()
````

## Task 2:
Save the data file as a CSV, open it and read the first 6 rows from it.
````{r}
# Read the data into a data frame (df) using read.csv()
dat <- read.csv("EPAGAS-1.XLS - Sheet1.csv")

# Use head to display the first 6 rows of data
head(dat,6)
````

## Task 3:
Make the object mpg and populate it with the MPG from the data file
````{r}
# make and assign the object data
mpg = dat$MPG
mpg
````
Now to transform mpg into z 
````{r}
# this calculation was shown in class and is in the given example code
z <- (mpg - mean(mpg)) / sd(mpg)
z
````
